data.title: Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran experiential in Los Angeles at
data.meta_description: Check out Shakira - Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran experiential at 7400 Melrose Avenue in Los Angeles on March 30, 2024 and get detailed info for the event - tickets, photos, video and reviews.
data.text:
Amazon Music will host an immersive event celebrating global Latin superstar and “Queen of Latin Music” Shakira’s latest album release on Saturday, March 30 at 1PM PT at 7400 Melrose Ave. This event will showcase the new album’s look and feel and introduce LA’s fans and influencers to "Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran", taking inspiration from powerful moods and precious gemstones to invigorate attendees and fuel excitement for Shakira’s newest release.

Fans who attend will be greeted with a mood-inspired digital quiz that will guide their experience throughout the event. They will also be treated to exclusive merch and giveaways, and an enhanced listening experience of the album using Amazon Music’s Dolby Atmos feature.
